article.title: Buffalo, Rochester, Syracuse U.S. Export Assistance Centers Contact Information
article.short_title: Buffalo, Rochester, Syracuse USEACs Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Buffalo and Rochester U.S. Export Assistance Centers and Syracuse Satellite Office.
article.content:
​

​Buffalo Office Contact Information

Buffalo U.S. Export Assistance Center
130 S. Elmwood Ave., Suite 530
Buffalo, NY 14202
Phone: 716-551-4191
Fax: 716-551-5290

Buffalo Staff

Rosanna Masucci
Director
Phone: 716-551-4191
Fax: 716-551-5290
Email:Rosanna.Masucci@trade.gov

Rochester Office Contact Information

Rochester U.S. Export Assistance Center
400 Andrews St., Suite 300
Rochester, NY 14604

Rochester Staff

Timothy McCall
Director
Phone: 585-399-7065
Fax: 585-423-7570
Email:timothy.mccall@trade.gov

Syracuse Office Contact Information

Syracuse Associate Office
445 Electronics Pkwy, Suite 207
Liverpool, NY 13088
Phone: (315) 453-4070
Fax: (315) 233-1259

Syracuse Staff

John Tracy
International Trade Specialist
Phone: 315-453-4070
Fax: 315-233-1259
Email:John.Tracy@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​
